name: Armechgeddon
description:
In Armechgeddon, you are dropped into an onslaught of robotic enemies and left to fight against all odds. Collect scrap and upgrade your mech and weapons, altering their behavior to survive as long as possible.

Easy to Learn, Hard to Master

You pilot your mech with the movement keys, and you can lock your rotation at any time to strafe. By mastering only these two controls, you can operate melee attacks, charging, jump jets, and a suite of overpowered weapons.


Conquer Multiple Locations and Difficulties

As you progress through different maps and difficulties, you'll unlock weapons, upgrades, pilots, and mechs. Purchase upgrades in the garage to make yourself unstoppable.


Scheduled New Content for Early Access

  • Mac and Linux support
  • 3 new mechs
  • 3 new pilots
  • 6 new weapons
  • 4 new upgrades
  • 2 new maps
  • Expanded boss battles and environmental content
